channel.title: CVE Feed for Synology -- MailPlus Server
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Synology -- MailPlus Server

item.title: CVE-2017-15890|2024-09-16T18:56:25.021Z -- synology -- mailplus%20server
item.description: Cross-site scripting (XSS) vulnerability in Disclaimer in Synology MailPlus Server before 1.4.0-0415 allows remote authenticated users to inject arbitrary web script or HTML via the NAME parameter.

item.title: CVE-2018-13296|2024-09-16T19:56:41.748Z -- synology -- mailplus%20server
item.description: Uncontrolled resource consumption vulnerability in TLS configuration in Synology MailPlus Server before 2.0.5-0606 allows remote attackers to conduct denial-of-service attacks via client-initiated renegotiation.
